data.news_body:
Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on Tuesday the 11th day of November 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved:

1. The Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for quarter and half year ended 30th September 2025. We have enclosed herewith a copy of the approved Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s Mehra Goel and Company Statutory Auditors of the Company. 

2. data.caption: Unaudited Standalone Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Nine Months Both Ended On 31St December, 2021.
data.news_body:
We hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 10th February, 2022 has approved Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended on 31st December, 2021.

A copy of the said Financial Results along with Limited Review Report thereon is enclosed herewith.

Kindly take the same for records.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended On 30Th September, 2021.
data.news_body: We hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 29th October, 2021 has approved Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2021. A copy of the said Financial Results along with Limited Review Report thereon is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results.
data.news_body:
We hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 29th October, 2021 approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2021.

The meeting of Board of Directors commenced at 12.00 noon and concluded at 12.30 p.m.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On 30Th June, 2021.
data.news_body: We hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 11th August, 2021 has approved Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2021. A copy of the said Financial Results along with Limited Review Report thereon is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. 11Th August, 2021
data.news_body:
We hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 11th August, 2021 approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2021.

The meeting of Board of Directors commenced at 12.30 p.m. and concluded at 01.00 p.m.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March, 2021.
data.news_body: We hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 8th June, 2021 has approved Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year both ended on 31st March, 2021. A copy of the said Financial Results along with Auditors' Report thereon is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. 8Th June, 2021
data.news_body:
We hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 8th June, 2021 approved the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year both ended on 31st March, 2021.

The meeting of Board of Directors commenced at 12.30 p.m. and concluded at 01.05 p.m.
